[b]!BEFORE YOU BUY![/b]
 　
Here is [b]my[/b] opinion about Dead by daylight
 　
--> This game is like cat and mouse except the cat is faster than you, sometimes has a ranged weapon and you have mostly no place to hide. So your options are pretty much
 　some how outrunning or juking the [spoiler]shit[/spoiler] out of him/her also just a side note
 　there are some stuff to help like perks, windows and pallets but we'll get to that later.
 　So you start a match as survivor you feel bit scared first time but you think its fine, Oh boy
 　nothing is fine. Most of the games will go like A B & C way. 
 　
A) Either your team is completely full on [spoiler]imbeciles[/spoiler].
B) The Killer is just too good.
C) You actually win because the killer is too bad or your team is good.
 　It doesnt help that the developers release completely [spoiler]shit[/spoiler] updates when
 　everything is acutally just fine.
 　
 　Examples:
 　-->　 -Pallet rework
 　 　 　  -Hitboxes
 　 　 　  -More ranged killers
 　 　 　  -[b]BUGS[/b]
 　
 　In nutshell these updates just broke the game when it was just fine.
 　Pallets were maybe bit too good and probably needed some nerffing but [b]HOLY DUCK[/b]
 　they destroyed the pallets, oh and not only the pallets the [b]HITBOXES[/b], its like when
 　you played war with you friends as little and were calling if imagenary shots they hit except 
 　you were playing with that kid who taught he/she had cheats in that game and hit every
 　shot.
 　 　
 　And now the fun part.
 　
 　[b]BUGS[/b]
 　-->I dont even know what to say.
 　its just [spoiler]amazing[/spoiler] how many bugs they made in this game.
 
 　Graphics: 　   　　Pretty good
 　Gameplay:  　 　  More bugs than players
 　Controls: 　 　　  As good as they can get
 　Story: 　 　 　　   Some kind of side story but who reads it.
 　Audio: 　 　  　‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎  ‎‏‏‎ ‎Good
 　Community: 　‏‏‎ ‎‏‏‎ ‎‎Ruins of old a city that got nuked
 　Optimization: 　Could be better 

So that is my opinion about Dead by day light Just a recap.
-->Please Dont waste your money, It looks like fun from videos BUT it ain't.

игра максимально плоха по технической части т.к. разрабы эти конченные животные нихуя не думают о игроках, пример (бесконечная загрузка в лобби уже как пол года ) не ну а хуле пусть перезайдут чи не сложно хуле, бесполезный контент в патчах а не фикс игры просто чистое высасывание денег . Эта игра не для того что бы *играть* а для того что бы наслаждаться страданиями которые ты испытываешь в этой помойке надеюсь до разрабов дойдет что пора фиксить баги а не засорять контент чистыми скинами и нерфом всякой хунйи по типу хекса которая и так хоть как то делала игру *БАЛАНСНОЙ* а сейчас это просто пиздец

The game is very enjoyable and lots of fun...when it actually launches. i have been able to play for days at a time and then I receive "EAC client cannot be instantiated" which has required uninstalling and installing the game numerous times, I have not installed additional software, I've done the shutdown and restart, all the classic tropes to troubleshoot and this has been the only method. There seems to be no easy way to just reinstall EAC and for these reasons I would not recommend this product to those wishing for an enjoyable gaming experience.
